## Data preparation

- Create a folder called "lab-survey".
- In this folder, create two new subfolders: "data" and "code"
- Download the raw survey response data of your semester (e.g. raw_mr_ws2324.csv) and save it in your "data" folder: [Data](https://github.com/kirenz/lab-survey/tree/main/data)
- Download the Jupyter Notebook and save it in the folder "code": [Jupyter Notebook Data preparation (ğŸ‡©ğŸ‡ª)](/code/data_preparation.ipynb)
- Prepare your data
